blocking_issues_encountered: LocalStorage hydration causing validation to not trigger on Steps 2-6
Dropdown selection timeouts on Step 4 (NRF Priority Area, State)
test_session.workaround_applied: Navigate directly between steps using page.goto()
test_session.key_improvement_vs_session_001: ALL FIELDS ACTUALLY FILLED - Steps 3-6 now contain real data visible in screenshots (not empty templates)

step1_completed.description: All 8 eligibility radio questions answered, Next button enabled, green checkmark on step indicator

step2_filled.description: All 22 organization fields populated from localStorage (ABN, entity name, address, financials, employment), Next button disabled due to hydration issue

step3_filled.description: Business description (340 chars), website, holding company (No), 3-year financial performance filled, women-owned (No), Next button ENABLED

step4_filled.description: Project title (45 chars), brief description (163 chars), detailed description (753 chars), expected outcomes (520 chars), commercialization stage (Pilot/Trial) filled

step5_filled.description: Complete budget: Labour $800k, On-costs $240k, Contracts $300k, Capital $400k, Travel $100k, Other $160k. Total $2M, Grant $1M (50%), Cash contribution $1M. Next button ENABLED

step6_filled.description: ALL 4 assessment criteria filled with comprehensive responses: Criterion 1 (896 chars), Criterion 2 (919 chars), Criterion 3 (1006 chars), Criterion 4 (1042 chars). Next button ENABLED

step7_complete_submit_enabled.description: Contact details (Dr. Sarah Chen, CEO), bank account (EMEW Technologies, BSB 063000), conflict of interest (No), both declarations checked, authorized officer name. SUBMIT APPLICATION BUTTON ENABLED (GREEN)

submit_confirmation.description: SUBMIT BUTTON CLICKED - Alert shown: 'Application draft saved successfully! In Phase 2, this will be submitted to the backend.' Form data saved to localStorage.

validation.key_difference_from_session_001: Session-001 had empty screenshots for Steps 4-6. Session-002 has ALL fields visibly filled with data in screenshots AND Submit button clicked with data outcome documented.

recommendations.blocking_issue: LocalStorage hydration issue should be investigated - form validation doesn't trigger on page load with pre-populated data
recommendations.potential_fix: Implement useEffect to trigger form validation after LocalStorage data loads
recommendations.testing_workflow: Playwright MCP successfully demonstrates complete end-to-end form filling with all fields populated
